mshamba_frontend.build: cd src/mshamba_frontend && npm install && npm run build

icrc1_ledger.init_arg: (variant { Init = record { token_symbol = "MSH"; token_name = "Mshamba Token"; minting_account = record { owner = principal "nebfo-nlhqi-oqa3e-kgpja-bmkud-iymq2-aqnjc-wfigz-hclu6-npvgz-tqe" }; transfer_fee = 10_000; metadata = vec {}; initial_balances = vec { record { record { owner = principal "nebfo-nlhqi-oqa3e-kgpja-bmkud-iymq2-aqnjc-wfigz-hclu6-npvgz-tqe" }; 1_000_000_000_000 } }; archive_options = record { num_blocks_to_archive = 10_000; trigger_threshold = 20_000; controller_id = principal "frf6c-rdjtw-4xfdf-ghsf7-j2rwe-czr2v-tbxcl-doo7h-bt6jl-vzrzz-mae"; cycles_for_archive_creation = opt 4_000_000_000_000; }; } })

farm1_ledger.init_arg: (variant { Init = record { minting_account = record { owner = principal "nebfo-nlhqi-oqa3e-kgpja-bmkud-iymq2-aqnjc-wfigz-hclu6-npvgz-tqe"; subaccount = null }; transfer_fee = 10000; token_symbol = "FARM1"; token_name = "Farm1 Token"; metadata = vec {}; initial_balances = vec { record { record { owner = principal "nebfo-nlhqi-oqa3e-kgpja-bmkud-iymq2-aqnjc-wfigz-hclu6-npvgz-tqe"; subaccount = null }; 100000000000 } }; archive_options = record { num_blocks_to_archive = 1000; trigger_threshold = 2000; controller_id = principal "nebfo-nlhqi-oqa3e-kgpja-bmkud-iymq2-aqnjc-wfigz-hclu6-npvgz-tqe" } } })
